name: Facebook Feed Post
primary_goal_vibe: Community interaction, storytelling, conversation, and relationship-building through flexible post formats.
tone_preference: Warm, narrative, and community-first. Clear, human, and dialog-oriented.

copy_guidelines.copy_best_practices: The first line must trigger curiosity or relevance before the 'see more' cut. Use short paragraphs, natural language, and conversational framing. Prioritize questions, stories, or relatable moments over announcements.
copy_guidelines.caption_structure_hint: Line 1: hook or tension. Lines 2–4: story, context, or explanation. Final line: direct question or participation-driven CTA.
copy_guidelines.recommended_caption_length: Short to medium. Enough to tell a story without becoming dense.
cta_examples: What do you think about this
Tell us your experience in the comments
Tag someone who should see this

text_post.caption_role: Conversation-first. The copy itself is the content.

single_image.caption_role: Narrative framing. The caption explains the story or moment behind the visual.

multi_image_album.caption_role: Story overview. The caption sets up what the viewer is about to scroll through and why it matters.

native_video.caption_role: Expectation-setting. The caption must clearly explain why the video is worth watching.

link_post.caption_role: Value justification. The caption must clearly state the benefit of clicking.

hashtags_mentions.recommended_hashtags: Optional and minimal. Use 0–3 context-specific hashtags only when they add clarity.
hashtags_mentions.hashtag_strategy: Do not rely on hashtags for reach. Discovery is driven by engagement signals.
hashtags_mentions.mention_strategy: Tag people, partners, or locations only when relevant to the content to stimulate replies and secondary visibility.

technical_constraints.video_behavior_note: Subtitles are strongly recommended. Many users watch with sound off.
technical_constraints.safe_area_note: Avoid placing key subjects or text near the edges to prevent cropping in feed previews and shared views.

disallowed_practices: Long, dense text blocks with no spacing
Using hashtags as a primary discovery tactic
